opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Roeder, Individually and on Behalf of All Others Similarly Situated v. Islamic Republic of Iran

opinion:
542 U.S. 915

ROEDER, INDIVIDUALLY AND ON BEHALF OF ALL OTHERS SIMILARLY SITUATED, ET AL.
v.
ISLAMIC REPUBLIC OF IRAN ET AL.

No. 03-1147.

Supreme Court of United States.

June 14, 2004.

1

C. A. D. C. Cir. Motion of George Allen et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 333 F. 3d 228.
